attributes.action: Provide free sanitary protection for girls in schools.
attributes.additional_details:
For some families, low incomes are leading to their daughters missing school because they are unable to access suitable sanitary protection. Menstruation is a fact of life for the entire female population and if girls are unable to purchase sanitary towels or tampons they are missing school. Toilet paper is not a substitute for proper sanitary wear.

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/girls-skipping-school-periods-cant-afford-tampons-sanitary-pads-a7629766.html
attributes.background:
We know the importance of attendance at school in the achievement of desired outcomes at the end of education. Barriers to attendance need to be removed

Today, there are girls who are unable to access suitable sanitary protection when they are menstruating and are missing school as a result.
